full_text:
Listen, I’ve never seen Adam Schefter make a mistake like he did this past weekend. I wasn’t happy when I saw it either, but he apologized. Which I believe to be sincere.

Let’s move on, Steelers Nation. https://t.co/wIPl7Z8emp
My heart is broken. I don’t what else to say right now. https://t.co/inuxvsWrtb
